term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - drying control chemical additive
term.title: drying control chemical additive

item.text: Co-solvent included to facilitate the rapid drying of gels without cracking.

sources.item: PAC, 2007, 79, 1801. 'Definitions of terms relating to the structure and processing of sols, gels, networks, and inorganic-organic hybrid materials (IUPAC Recommendations 2007)' on page 1809 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac200779101801)
